oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Eleventh Street Church of Christ, 2001 December
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of the Eleventh Street Church of Christ. This church is located at 1100 Shelby Avenue in Nashville, Tennessee. Foundation material is red brick. Exterior walls are brick. The roof is composed of tar shingles. Windows are a combination of rectangular clear glass, frosted glass, large square colored glass, and arched colored glass. Doors are metal with glass window and wood with glass windows. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Eleventh Street Church of Christ (Nashville, Tenn.)
